lines.text: How 'bout a ride to town, mister?
There's a man in a flying suit chasing us. Step on it.
[Commando Cody, Ted, and Joan are about to board ship for the moon]
I still think this is no trip for a woman.
Now don't start that again. You'll be very glad to have someone along who can cook your meals.
[After one of the Moon Men is killed while onboard Cody's Rocket.]
What are they going to to with him?
It's just like a burial at sea, Joan. He'll just float around and around.
